exceptions.tactic: specialize (H0 net p t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit).
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface cti : cronies_term_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data d : raft_data h : name os : list raft_output d' : raft_data ms : list (name * msg) H : doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) H0 : forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> 0 < prevLogTerm -> exists h : name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) prevLogTerm)) = true /\\ (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = prevLogTerm -> type (snd (nwState net h)) <> Candidate) H1 : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : nwState net h = (gd, d) H3 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h' H4 : forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \\/ In p (send_packets h ms) p : packet t : term leaderId : name prevLogIndex : logIndex prevLogTerm : term entries : list entry leaderCommit : logIndex H5 : In p (nwPackets {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}) H6 : pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit H7 : 0 < prevLogTerm The term "net" has type "network" while it is expected to have type "packet".
